Author: mayolespa
Text: I feel like if you have to ask, then that's your answer. Most people dont question their eating habits other than "oh I ate too much today better tone it down and rest tomorrow" or something along the lines of that. I used to think I never had any problems and that it was completely controllable because every summer I could eat normally and rarely care about my weight. Everytime I relapse around winter it just gets worse which is what finally convinced me. You are valid, and your struggles are valid <3
